attributes.action: take a urgent action to undertake legal proceedings against all involved in the Irish Catholic Church Abuse Scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been proved that over a period spanning more than 70 years Irish Priests and Nuns horrifically abused children in their care.

No charges have been brought against the monsters that inflicted this abuse. 1000s of victims came forward and gave testimonies of their abuse.

This wouldve took huge strength and courage but no justice has been done. It is bad enough these victims were let down first time round but a 2nd time is so unfair.

The Men and Women who abused these children should be held accountable for their crimes

rejection.details: The UK Government does not have control over Ireland. You should address your concerns to the Irish Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
